Name: Ethical or Moral Reasoning - PE
Text: This is subtle but may violate fairness especially if its not justified by business necessity or if its not transparent It can amplify existing inequities if certain groups are more likely to be members of local community groups they get higher scores leading to better loan terms We should also talk about the legal and ethical ramifications even though local affiliation is not a protected characteristic under law e g not race gender its possibly a proxy for other protected characteristics e g location correlates with race That could lead to disparate impact Also fairness equity requires consistent treatment but giving advantage to a non protected group can still be unfair to other groups and can be considered discrimination if it leads to unequal outcomes The model could be considered a bias by design if the XOR choice is not made explicitly
